text: Van Zandt Jarvis Williams (February 27, 1934 – November 28, 2016) was an American actor. He played Kenny Madison in both Warner Bros. television detective series Bourbon Street Beat (1959–1960) and its sequel, Surfside 6 (1960–1962). He teamed up with with Bruce Lee as his partner Kato, in the television series The Green Hornet during 1966–1967. Category:1934 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors
title: Van Williams
